author: alexm

review: This product definitely fills a hole in the market. Overall, I really do love it. It's a brilliant idea, and it's really good for what I want it for. There are a few updates on the product that I am waiting for however:The product only supports a few video players. Netflix, Hulu, HBO go, but I can't play my amazon prime videos without using the chrome browser extension.The browser extension often makes the videos choppy and slow.The sound and picture sometimes get out of sync.Overall a good product for $35 but I think it's going to be even better in a few years!
author: Amanda

review: The first try went well. I was able to give it the password for my wireless network, it connected, and I was able to stream hulu programming the rest of the evening.  I turned my tv off for a week. The next week end I tried to use it again.  It would not connect to my wireless network.  I tried three times going through the setup again, but I was not able to get it to connect.  I will be returning the device.Thinking about it. The first thing that the device did after successfully connecting to my network was to download new firmware.  I would guess that the new firmware has a flaw that prevents it from connecting again.
